name: Identification code
xml:
<field
	type="text"
	name="id_code"
	label="Identification code"
	size="10"
	maxlength="50"
	default=""
	description="Do NOT write, will be generated at SAVE"
	class="text_area"
	readonly="true"
	disabled="false"
	required="false"
	filter="STRING"
	validate=""
	field=""
	message="Do NOT write, will be generated at SAVE"
	hint="Do NOT write, will be generated at SAVE"
	autocomplete="on"
	showon=""
	onchange=""
/>
